item.text: Now as Jesus was going out of the temple courts and walking away, his disciples came to show him the temple buildings.
And he said to them, “Do you see all these things? I tell you the truth, not one stone will be left on another. All will be torn down!”
As he was sitting on the Mount of Olives, his disciples came to him privately and said, “Tell us, when will these things happen? And what will be the sign of your coming and of the end of the age?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="991">Watch out</st><n id="2" /> that <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4105" class="">misleads</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ,’</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="4105" class="">mislead</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>.

You <st data-num="3195" class="">will</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> of <st data-num="4171" class="">wars</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="189" class="">rumors</st> of <st data-num="4171" class="">wars</st>. <st data-num="3708">Make sure</st> that you are <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2360" class="">alarmed</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> this <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">happen</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3768">still to come</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st> will <st data-num="1453">rise up</st> in arms<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3042">famines</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4578" class="">earthquakes</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5117">various places</st>.<n id="3" />
All these things are the beginning of birth pains.
“Then they will hand you over to be persecuted and will kill you. You will be hated by all the nations because of my name.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> will be <st data-num="4624">led into sin</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="3860" class="">betray</st> one <st data-num="240" class="">another</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3404" class="">hate</st> one <st data-num="240" class="">another</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="5578">false prophets</st> will <st data-num="1453" class="">appear</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4105" class="">deceive</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> <st data-num="458" class="">lawlessness</st> will <st data-num="4129" class="">increase so much</st>, the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> of <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> will <st data-num="5594">grow cold</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="3778" class="">person</st> who <st data-num="5278" class="">endures</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st> will be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>.<n id="1" />
And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached throughout the whole inhabited earth as a testimony to all the nations, and then the end will come.
“So when you see the abomination of desolation—spoken about by Daniel the prophet—standing in the holy place” (let the reader understand),

“<st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> those <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> must <st data-num="5343" class="">flee</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3735" class="">mountains</st>.

The one <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1430" class="">roof</st><n id="1" /> must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2597">come down</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> anything <st data-num="1537">out of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the one <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="68" class="">field</st> must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1994" class="">turn</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">back</st> to <st data-num="142" class="">get</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloak</st>.

<st data-num="3759" class="">Woe</st><n id="1" /> to those who <st data-num="2192" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1064">pregnant</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> who are <st data-num="2337" class="">nursing</st> their babies <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>!

<st data-num="4336" class="">Pray</st><n id="1" /> that <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5437" class="">flight</st> may <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> in <st data-num="5494" class="">winter</st> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> on a <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">suffering</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3634" class="">unlike</st> anything that has <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3756 3361">ever</st> will <st data-num="1096" class="">happen</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> had <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="2856" class="">cut short</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">one</st> would be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1223">for the sake of</st> the <st data-num="1588" class="">elect</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> will be <st data-num="2856">cut short</st>.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2036" class="">says</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, ‘<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> is the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ!’</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> ‘<st data-num="5602">There</st> he is!’ do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> him.

<st data-num="1063">For</st> <st data-num="5580">false messiahs</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5578" class="">false prophets</st> will <st data-num="1453" class="">appear</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">perform</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5059" class="">wonders</st> <st data-num="5620" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4105" class="">deceive</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">possible</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> the <st data-num="1588" class="">elect</st>.
<st data-num="2400" class="">Remember</st>,<n id="1" /> I have <st data-num="4280" class="">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4280">ahead of time</st>.

<st data-num="3767">So then</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> someone<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">says</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, ‘<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness,’</st><n id="2" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1831">go out</st>, or ‘<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5009">inner rooms</st>,’ do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> him.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5618">just like</st> the <st data-num="796" class="">lightning</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1831" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="395" class="">east</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5316" class="">flashes</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1424" class="">west</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> the <st data-num="3952" class="">coming</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st>.
Wherever the corpse is, there the vultures will gather.
“Immediately after the suffering of those days, the sun will be darkened, and the moon will not give its light; the stars will fall from heaven, and the powers of heaven will be shaken.
Then the sign of the Son of Man will appear in heaven, and all the tribes of the earth will mourn. They will see the Son of Man arriving on the clouds of heaven with power and great glory.
And he will send his angels with a loud trumpet blast, and they will gather his elect from the four winds, from one end of heaven to the other.
“Learn this parable from the fig tree: Whenever its branch becomes tender and puts out its leaves, you know that summer is near.

<st data-num="3779" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st>, <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st>, right <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3928">pass away</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="1096">take place</st>.
Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will never pass away.
“But as for that day and hour no one knows it—not even the angels in heaven—except the Father alone.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5618">just like</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of <st data-num="3575" class="">Noah</st><n id="1" /> were, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> the <st data-num="3952" class="">coming</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="2627" class="">flood</st>, people<n id="1" /> were <st data-num="5176" class="">eating</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drinking</st>, <st data-num="1060" class="">marrying</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1061">giving in marriage</st>, <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="3575" class="">Noah</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="2787" class="">ark</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="1097" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="2627" class="">flood</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="142" class="">took</st> them <st data-num="537" class="">all</st> away.<n id="1" /> It will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2532">the same</st> at the <st data-num="3952" class="">coming</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> men <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="68" class="">field;</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> will be <st data-num="3880" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="863" class="">left</st>.<n id="1" />
There will be two women grinding grain with a mill; one will be taken and one left.
“Therefore stay alert because you do not know on what day your Lord will come.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">this:</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="3617">owner of the house</st> had <st data-num="1492" class="">known</st> at <st data-num="4169" class="">what</st> time of <st data-num="5438" class="">night</st> the <st data-num="2812" class="">thief</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st>, he would have been <st data-num="1127" class="">alert</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> have <st data-num="1439" class="">let</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> be <st data-num="1358">broken into</st>.
Therefore you also must be ready because the Son of Man will come at an hour when you do not expect him.
“Who then is the faithful and wise slave, whom the master has put in charge of his household, to give the other slaves their food at the proper time?

<st data-num="3107" class="">Blessed</st> is <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">finds</st> at <st data-num="4160" class="">work</st><n id="1" /> when he <st data-num="2064">comes</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> the master<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="2525" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2525">in charge</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5225">possessions</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1565">that</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st> should <st data-num="3004">say</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">himself</st>,<n id="2" /> ‘<st data-num="1473" class="">My</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> is <st data-num="5549">staying away a long time</st>,’

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="757">begins</st> to <st data-num="5180" class="">beat</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4889">fellow slaves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3184" class="">drunkards</st>,

then the <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> of <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st> will <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">when</st> he does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4328" class="">expect</st> him <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> an <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st> he does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">foresee</st>,
and will cut him in two, and assign him a place with the hypocrites, where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
